awd_abstract_narration: The Principal Investigators (PIs)                                               seek to address the issue of                                                    micromixing (mixing on the scale of                                             the biological cell) and                                                        micro-segregation of reactants.  Do                                             these factors produce a biological                                              response in a growing cell?  Do                                                 they cause changes in cell yield                                                and the production of secondary                                                 metabolites?  The ultimate                                                      objective is to advance engineering                                             science to the stage where                                                      micromixing can be used as a design                                             parameter in the design of                                                      fermenters.
org_div_long_name: Division of Chemical, Bioengineering, Environmental, and Transport Systems
